member.name: T:Kingo.ErrorMessages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Kingo.ErrorMessages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ErrorMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ErrorMessages.Constraint_ValueNotValid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified value ({0}) is not valid..

member.name: P:Kingo.ErrorMessages.OrConstraint_ValueNotValid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified value ({0}) should satisfy any of the following constraints: [{1}]..

member.name: T:Kingo.ExceptionMessages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.Constraint_UnsupportedType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value of type '{0}' could not be validated because the constraint expects an instance of type '{1}'..

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.ChildMemberAttribute
member.summary: This attribute can be used to decorate fields or properties of a to signal that it represents an item, collection or dictionary that should be validated in and of itself. Any validation-errors of the child-member will be added to the set of validation-errors of the parent.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.ChildMemberAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.ChildMemberAttribute.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If specified, defines the error-message that is added to the collection of validation-results if any child-members are invalid. This property cannot be used in combination with the and properties.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.ChildMemberAttribute.ErrorMessageResourceType
member.summary: If specified, defines the resource-type where the localized error-message can be retrieved that is added to the collection of validation-results if any child-members are invalid. This property should be used in combination with the -property.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.ChildMemberAttribute.ErrorMessageResourceName
member.summary: If specified, defines the resource-name of the localized error-message inside the resource-type that is added to the collection of validation-results if any child-members are invalid. This property should be used in combination with the -property.

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.ObjectExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension-methods for every object.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.ObjectExtensions.IsNotValid(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult}@,System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Determines whether or not the specified is valid, and provides all validation errors if it's not.
member.param: If this instance is not valid, this collection will contain all validation-errors; will be null otherwise.
Optional service provider that can be used to obtain services for validating this instance.
member.returns: true if the instance is not valid; otherwise false.

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.ValidatableObject
member.summary: Represents a data contract that can be validated.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.ValidatableObject.Validate(System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext)
member.summary: Validates all constraints that are not declared as a .

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.ValidatableObject.ValidateChildMembers(System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext)
member.summary: Validates all the constraints of child members.
member.returns: A collection of validation-errors, if any.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.ValidatableObject.NewValidationError(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Creates and returns a new with a specific error message.
member.param: Error message describing the validation error.
Names of the members that are considered invalid.
member.returns: A new that represents the validation error.
